attributes.action: All EFL Championship match tickets to be the same price.
attributes.additional_details: Attendances within the English Football League could be considerably higher if all clubs within each league in the EFL agree to set ticket prices the same.
attributes.background: Football matches within the EFL Championship should all be the same price in order to make attending football matches affordable for those that are less fortunate. The same should apply in League 1 & League 2.
